Notes: An area that changes the currently active lightin configuration when entered. The available light configurations as well as their IDs have to be specified in the zone's Light file.

Obj_arg0.Name: Light ID
Obj_arg0.Description: The ID of the light configuration to be used.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
